biotools.summary: MLDA is a tool for the exploration and analysis of multi-label datasets with both simple and multiple views. MLDA comprises a GUI and a Java API, providing the user with a wide set of charts, metrics, methods for transforming and preprocessing data, as well as comparison of several datasets.
